name: part_008
file: tmp_【#マリン出航3DLIVE】ゲストとワイワイ！Marine Set Sail!! Concert!!【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [vLGCYbnYhPg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Sorairo Days' by Houshou Marine and Nakiri Ayame.
MC section where Marine and Ayame talk about their frequent collaborations and a funny story about reading mirrored text.
Performance of the song 'Hitorigoto' by Houshou Marine and Usada Pekora.

subtitles.original: 過ぎた奇跡を 嘆く暇ない
subtitles.english: No time to mourn the miracles of the past

subtitles.original: 二度と迷って しまわぬように
subtitles.english: So I won't get lost again

subtitles.original: 数えきれない ほんのささやかな
subtitles.english: Countless, tiny...

subtitles.original: そんな後悔 抱えたまま
subtitles.english: ...regrets, I'll keep holding onto them

subtitles.original: そんな背中だけ 追いかけて ここまで来たんだ
subtitles.english: I've come this far just chasing that back

subtitles.original: 探していた 僕だけにできること
subtitles.english: Looking for what only I can do

subtitles.original: あの日くれた 言葉が今でも
subtitles.english: The words you gave me that day, even now...

subtitles.original: この胸に確かに 届いてるから
subtitles.english: ...are definitely reaching this heart

subtitles.original: 昨日よりも 今日僕は僕の
subtitles.english: More than yesterday, today I...

subtitles.original: 生まれてきた 理由に気づいてゆく
subtitles.english: ...am realizing the reason I was born

subtitles.original: 答えはそう いつもここにある
subtitles.english: The answer is, yes, always right here

subtitles.original: 全てが回るね 当たり前みたいだ
subtitles.english: Everything turns, like it's natural

subtitles.original: 尊い日々は まだ終わらない そして...
subtitles.english: The precious days are not over yet, and...

subtitles.original: また...
subtitles.english: ...again...

subtitles.original: 走り出した 思いが今でも
subtitles.english: The feelings that started running, even now...

subtitles.original: この胸を確かに 叩いてるから
subtitles.english: ...are definitely beating in this chest

subtitles.original: 今日の僕が その先につづく
subtitles.english: The me of today will continue beyond...

subtitles.original: 僕らなりの 明日を築いてゆく
subtitles.english: ...to build our own tomorrow

subtitles.original: 答えはそう いつもここにある
subtitles.english: The answer is, yes, always right here

subtitles.original: はぁ〜！
subtitles.english: Haah!

subtitles.original: あ〜！あやめ先輩、もう！
subtitles.english: Ah! Ayame-senpai, jeez!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original:
なんかこういうライブみたいなやつ、
あやめ先輩と歌って踊るのもう何回目ですかね
subtitles.english:
Something like this live concert,
how many times has it been singing and dancing with Ayame-senpai?

subtitles.original: 4回目ぐらい？ 3？
subtitles.english: Maybe about the 4th time? 3?

subtitles.original: え、それってもうかなりラブラブっぷりですよね
subtitles.english: Eh, that's already quite a lovey-dovey relationship, isn't it?

subtitles.original: え？ 今日はなんて呼んでくれたの？
subtitles.english: Eh? What did you call me today?

subtitles.original: あ、アイスとか…
subtitles.english: Ah, ice or something...

subtitles.original: ガチで鳥肌立ってきた今
subtitles.english: I'm literally getting goosebumps right now.

subtitles.original: あやめ…いや、あやめちん
subtitles.english: Ayame... no, Ayame-chin.

subtitles.original:
そのさ、あやめちんってあれ？
もしかして、もしかして、あれですか？
subtitles.english:
That 'Ayame-chin', is it...
could it be, could it be that?

subtitles.original: そう、ちょっと振付の動画を前に出していたんですけど、カンニングしながら…
subtitles.english:
Yeah, I put out a choreography video before,
while cheating (looking at it)...

subtitles.original: カンニングしながらね、ちょっと私たち練習してたんですけど
subtitles.english: While cheating, we were practicing a bit.

subtitles.original: これ反転してたらね
subtitles.english: If this was mirrored...

subtitles.original: そう、反転したほうが踊りやすいんだよね
subtitles.english: Yeah, it's easier to dance if it's mirrored.

subtitles.original: あやめちんマリンちんになってたわ
subtitles.english: It became Ayame-chin Marine-chin.

subtitles.original:
そう、さ（SA）が繋がってるやつで、
そう、ひっくり返って『ちん（CHIN）』に見えたんですよね
subtitles.english:
Yeah, the 'SA' was connected, and
it looked like 'CHIN' when flipped.

subtitles.original:
ね。え、まさかこの話で終わりですか？
これもう1分経ってる？ もしかして
subtitles.english:
Right. Eh, are we seriously ending with this story?
Has it already been a minute? Maybe?

subtitles.original: ちょ、あ、時間、時間だ！
subtitles.english: Wait, ah, time, it's time!

subtitles.original: あ、ちょ、待って！ 待って待って！
subtitles.english: Ah, wait! Wait, wait!

subtitles.original:
待って！ 時間お願いします！
まだちょっと愛してる、愛してる、愛してる
subtitles.english:
Wait! Time please!
Still a bit... I love you, I love you, I love you.

subtitles.original: 時間お願いします！ 愛してる！ あー、あやめー！
subtitles.english: Time please! I love you! Ah, Ayame-!

subtitles.original: ヒトリゴトだよ 恥ずかしいこと聞かないでよね
subtitles.english: It's a monologue, don't ask embarrassing things, okay?

subtitles.original: 君のことだよ でもその先は言わないけどね
subtitles.english: It's about you, but I won't say any more than that.

subtitles.original: 掛け違えてるボタンみたいな もどかしさを
subtitles.english: The frustration, like buttons done up wrong.

subtitles.original: ほどけないまま また難しくしようとしてる
subtitles.english: Without unravelling it, trying to make it difficult again.

subtitles.original: 伝えたい気持ちは今日も
subtitles.english: The feelings I want to convey, today too...

subtitles.original: 言葉になる直前に
subtitles.english: ...just before they turn into words...

subtitles.original: 変換ミスの連続で
subtitles.english: ...are a series of conversion errors...

subtitles.original: ため息と一緒に
subtitles.english: ...along with a sigh...
